Message: The user completes the submission of the form
can you help me for event management setting to everflow

Sure, I can help you with setting up event management for Everflow. Here are the steps you need to follow:
1. Log in to the Everflow account associated with your offer and click on the upper left menu button and select 'Postbacks.'
2. On the 'Manage Postbacks' page, make sure you are under the 'Conversions' tab and click '+Postback.'
3. In the pop-up form, select the following items:
   - Status: Active
   - Postback Type: Conversion
   - Postback Level: Global
   - Delivery Method: Postback
4. Once Postback is selected, you need to enter the Postback URL.
5. In NewsBreak ad platform, go to Tools → Event management → Web Events → Create/test web event.
6. Name the event, select Postback, choose Everflow as the tracking service and choose your event type. You could also turn on Event value if you have a value associated with this event.
For more detailed information, please refer to this article: [How to set up an Everflow Postback on NewsBreak](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/22576502022285-How-to-set-up-an-Everflow-Postback-on-NewsBreak).

It looks like you want to set up a postback. Here are the steps to set up a postback for Everflow on NewsBreak:
1. Log in to your Everflow account and click on the upper left menu button, then select 'Postbacks.'
2. On the 'Manage Postbacks' page, make sure you are under the 'Conversions' tab and click '+Postback.'
3. In the pop-up form, select the following items:
   - Status: Active
   - Postback Type: Conversion
   - Postback Level: Global
   - Delivery Method: Postback
4. Enter the Postback URL generated from NewsBreak.
5. In NewsBreak ad platform, go to Tools → Event management → Web Events → Create/test web event.
6. Name the event, select Postback, choose Everflow as the tracking service and choose your event type.
For more detailed information, please refer to this article: [How to set up an Everflow Postback on NewsBreak](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/22576502022285-How-to-set-up-an-Everflow-Postback-on-NewsBreak).
